title: Mindbreeze Opens New Office in Silver Spring
text:
SILVER SPRING, Md. — Mindbreeze, a leading international provider of appliances and cloud services for information insight and applied artificial intelligence with a focus on knowledge management for international clients, is expanding and opening a new office in Silver Spring, MD.

“Our philosophy is to work and innovate close to our customers. The growing number of major customers, particularly from the public sector, was a decisive factor for establishing the new office location in Silver Spring,” explains Daniel Fallmann, founder and managing director of Mindbreeze.

“To ensure the rapid growth of our team, we are constantly on the lookout for the brightest minds to serve and support our customers, especially in the field of search consulting,” adds Michael Biebl, Head of Professional Services.

Gartner Inc. has positioned the company as a Leader in the 2019 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Insight Engines. Download the 2019 Magic Quadrant for Insight Engines now.

Organizations such as the Food and Drug Administration, Lufthansa, and Daimler are already benefiting from Mindbreeze’s AI-based insight engine to manage their information more efficiently and intelligently.

Gartner Inc., Magic Quadrant for Insight Engines, Stephen Emmott, Saniye Alaybeyi, Anthony Mullen, September 17, 2019.

About Mindbreeze

Mindbreeze is a leading international provider of appliances and cloud services for enterprise search, applied artificial intelligence, and knowledge management. Mindbreeze’s global network of partners makes it possible to serve customers across time zones anywhere in the world.

You can find more information at www.mindbreeze.com or follow us on LinkedIn and Twitter @Mindbreeze.
